TransferQuotaPolicy.MORE_INFO: The following headers in the response contain useful information relating to quota limit:

DESCRIPTIONS.TRY_IT_OUT: Displays the Open API definition (Swagger) and allows for making test calls if the API is available.
DESCRIPTIONS.API_KEY:
When an API contract is created, the system generates a unique API Key.
This API Key is unique per client and the same for all contracts of this client.
All requests made to the API must include this API Key:
DESCRIPTIONS.API_ENDPOINT: Use this URL to access the API:
